name: Paid Memberships Pro Click & Pledge Gateway
author: Click & Pledge

sections.description:
The Paid Memberships Pro Click & Pledge Gateway plug-in allows you to accept on-line payments in your WordPress Paid Memberships Pro store. Download the Paid Memberships Pro Click & Pledge Gateway plug-in and start accepting payments from all major brands with your Click & Pledge account: Visa,American Express,Discover,MasterCard.

Paid Memberships Pro plugin

Set up unlimited membership levels and provide restricted access to pages, posts, categories, videos, forums, downloads, support, single “a la carte” page access, and more. Paid Memberships Pro is flexible enough to fit the needs of almost all online and offline businesses. It works great out of the box, but is easy for developers to customize to fit your needs

Paid Memberships Pro is the community solution for adding paid memberships to your WordPress site.

About Click & Pledge

Click & Pledge was Founded in May 2000. To be sure, Click & Pledge is not too good to be true. It is, however, a Company that has changed the way non-profits do business. Not only do we deliver the most comprehensive cloud-based fund raising and management products, but we lower your risk, save you money and offer exciting new ways for organizations to run. Since 2002, Click & Pledge has served over 10,000 customers in 46 countries…and we’re carefully expanding. Good, but not too good to be true.

Please note: This addon requires that you have a Click & Pledge Account to accept credit card and debit card payments. You can get an account at Click & Pledge. If you have any questions you can Contact Us anytime.
sections.installation:
Note:Click here for detailed instructions

Simply follow these steps to install:
1. Download & Unzip the file.
2. Upload the unzipped folder to your WordPress Plugins directory.
3. Login to your WordPress Admin, then go to Plugins and activate the “Paid Memberships Pro Click & Pledge Gateway” plugin
4. Within the WordPress Admin, go to Memberships >> Payment Settings, then click on the Payment Gateways tab, then select “Click & Pledge” From “Payment Gateway”.
5. Enter the proper information

To use in “Live Mode”

1. Gather your Click & Pledge API “Account ID” and “API Account GUID”
2. Login to your WordPress Admin.
3. Go to Memberships >> Payment Settings and select “Click & Pledge” From “Payment Gateway”.
4. Select “Live/Production” from “Gateway Environment”.
5. Enter your “Account ID” .
6. Enter your API “API Account GUID”.
7. Click “Save Settings”. Your website/Memberships are now setup to process transactions via your Click & Pledge account. We recommend that you process a test transaction, then login to your Click & Pledge account to confirm that it appears in your account.

To use in “Test Mode”
1. Gather your Click & Pledge API “Account ID” and “API Account GUID”
2. Login to your WordPress Admin.
3. Go to Memberships >> Payment Settings and select “Click & Pledge” From “Payment Gateway”.
4. Select “Sandbox/Testing” from “Gateway Environment”.
5. Enter your “Account ID” .
6. Enter your API “API Account GUID”.
7. Click “Save Settings”. Your website/Memberships are now setup to process transactions via your Click & Pledge account. We recommend that you process a test transaction, then login to your Click & Pledge account to confirm that it appears in your account.

Test Credit Card Info:
Test Credit Card: 4111111111111111
Test Expiration Date: 01/28
Test CCV: 111

2.0.0

  • Addition of Connect Campaign URL Alias allowing for updating of the set campaign as well as sending the selected campaign customized receipt.
  • Compatibility with the latest PMP release v1.8.13.5.

1.0.7

  • Fixed tax handling issue when initial amount is zero

1.0.6

  • Fixed The total number of recurring billing cycles for this level, including
    the trial period (if applicable) but not including the initial payment

1.0.5

  • Fixed recurring issue

1.0.4

  • Added SKU for Memberships levels

1.0.3

  • Fixed forums URL issues

1.0.2

  • Fixed issues to display billing fields and payment fields
  • Make Compatible with PMP version 1.8.4.5

1.0.1

  • Released as a separate plugin

1.0.0

  • Code Released to public
